title: Private Endpoint Manager Configuration
description: Configuration schema for Azure Private Endpoint DNS Manager

version.description: Configuration version in semantic versioning format (e.g., 1.0.0)

privateDnsZoneSubscriptionId.description: Azure subscription ID where private DNS zones are located

excludedSubscriptionIds.description: List of subscription IDs to exclude from processing

privateDnsZoneMappings.description: Mapping of private link service group IDs to their DNS zones

zoneName.description: FQDN of the private DNS zone (e.g., privatelink.blob.core.windows.net)

resourceId.description: Full Azure resource ID of the private DNS zone
